title: Product Manager
description: As a product manager at Microsoft, Feynman is in the Azure Container Registry team and focuses on the software secure supply chain.

title: DevOps Editor
description: As a DevOps editor, Feynman is writing the technical news and sharing his insights around cloud native and open source projects on infoq.com.

title: Senior Community Manager
description: As a senior community manager at QingCloud, he is growing and maintaining the KubeSphere open source community, which helps users to widely adopt Kubernetes and reduce the learning curve of using cloud-native technologies. He focuses on advocacy and outreach, community growth, documentation, and user case studies.
